title: #78 - Hotline Edition: What Do I Do When I Feel Dating Fatigue?
description:
This week, we open up the Ask a Matchmaker Hotline and talk to YOU about YOUR dating questions. Care to ask Maria a question for the next one? Be sure to follow her on Instagram to find out when the hotline will be open again. 

This week…

  • I’m feeling fatigued and defeated. What should I do?
  • I’ve been dating “by the book” and I’m not sure about a guy.
  • I have a really tough schedule, how do I find time to meet people?
  • How do I choose whether to connect with someone on a dating app?
  • Should I do a video chat with someone before we meet in person?
  • My neighbor seems cool. Should I ask him to coffee?
  • How do you feel about dating someone who is separated but not divorced? 

Share your name and email and you will be notified first when details for the Agape Intensive Retreat - April 29- May 1, 2022 - are released! https://agapematch.wufoo.com/forms/z14chqhd03yfh04/

Follow Maria on Instagram to find out when the Matchmaker Hotline will be open to talk! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
